get.description: Validate if a Peppol ID exists in the Peppol network and retrieve supported document types. The peppol_id must be in the form of `<scheme>:<id>`. The scheme is a 4-digit code representing the identifier scheme, and the id is the actual identifier value. For example, for a Belgian company it is `0208:0123456789` (where 0208 is the scheme for Belgian enterprises, followed by the 10 digits of the official BTW / KBO number).

parameters.name: peppol_id

schema.description: Peppol ID in the format `<scheme>:<id>`. Example: `0208:1018265814` for a Belgian company.
schema.title: Peppol Id

parameters.description: Peppol ID in the format `<scheme>:<id>`. Example: `0208:1018265814` for a Belgian company.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity: Invalid Peppol ID format

500.description: Internal Server Error: Unexpected server error

get.description: Lookup Peppol ID. The peppol_id must be in the form of `<scheme>:<id>`. The scheme is a 4-digit code representing the identifier scheme, and the id is the actual identifier value. For example, for a Belgian company it is `0208:0123456789` (where 0208 is the scheme for Belgian enterprises, followed by the 10 digits of the official BTW / KBO number).

parameters.name: peppol_id

reason_code.title: Reason Code
reason_code.description: The code for the allowance reason

multiplier_factor.title: Multiplier Factor
multiplier_factor.description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the allowance base amount, to calculate the allowance amount. To state 20%, use value 20

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The allowance amount, without VAT. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

base_amount.title: Base Amount
base_amount.description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the allowance percentage, to calculate the allowance amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

tax_rate.title: Tax Rate
tax_rate.description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies to the allowance

tax_code.description: The VAT category code that applies to the allowance

Allowance-Input.title: Allowance
Allowance-Input.description: An allowance is a discount for example for early payment, volume discount, etc.

tax_code.description: Tax category code of the invoice

vatex.description: VAT exemption reason of the invoice

vatex_note.title: Vatex Note
vatex_note.description: VAT exemption note of the invoice

subtotal.title: Subtotal
subtotal.description: The taxable base of the invoice. Should be the sum of all line items - allowances (for example commercial discounts) + charges with impact on VAT. Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

total_discount.title: Total Discount
total_discount.description: The total financial discount of the invoice (so discounts not subject to VAT). Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

total_tax.title: Total Tax
total_tax.description: The total tax of the invoice. Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

invoice_total.title: Invoice Total
invoice_total.description: The total amount of the invoice (so invoice_total = subtotal + total_tax + total_discount). Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

amount_due.title: Amount Due
amount_due.description: The amount due of the invoice. Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

previous_unpaid_balance.title: Previous Unpaid Balance
previous_unpaid_balance.description: The previous unpaid balance of the invoice, if any. Must be positive and rounded to maximum 2 decimals

items.title: Items
items.description: At least one line item is required

PeppolIdLookupResponse.title: PeppolIdLookupResponse
PeppolIdLookupResponse.description:
Response from a Peppol ID lookup operation.

This model represents the complete result of validating and looking up a Peppol ID
in the Peppol network, including DNS information, service metadata, business card
details, and certificate information.

Example:
    A successful lookup for a Peppol ID "0192:991825827" would return DNS information,
    service metadata with supported document types and processes, business card information
    with organization details, and certificate data.

is_valid.title: Is Valid
is_valid.description: Whether the Peppol ID is valid and registered in the Peppol network

dns_valid.title: Dns Valid
dns_valid.description: Whether the DNS resolves to a valid SMP

business_card_valid.title: Business Card Valid
business_card_valid.description: Whether a business card is set at the SMP

business_card.description: Business card information for the Peppol ID

PeppolIdValidationResponse.title: PeppolIdValidationResponse
PeppolIdValidationResponse.description:
Response for a Peppol ID validation request.

This model represents the validation result of a Peppol ID in the Peppol network,
including whether the ID is valid and what document types it supports.
